column4: help.. cant install xubuntu or boot to windows.  i am on the livecd atm.  i need to install xubuntu or re-burn the cd.  the iso is on my windows partition. what should i do?
what do you mean cant install
the cd is bad i think, first check the iso with md5sum like so in terminal $md5sum iso
then burn slowly like at 8x
cool down? that s not an issue really but do one thing, when live cd boots up and comes to the menu, check cd for defects
ok try wit h new cd then, or do a usb boot
ubottu is a bot :) not human
do you have pen drive? do you want to try usb boot
yes it is indeed
aah no ignore that link, go to unetbootin with google
well, select option boot from first hard disk
then press button
cant boot from hard disk? hmm
ok restart
remove cd from tray by pressing button what else
that will get me nowhere as i cannot boot
before it goes to live cd boot again that is, or enter bios
why cant you boot into windows?
no Jordan_U i'll try it.
do you have the windows cd with you?
it does? you get to a desktop?
ya im on it right now
ok then do what Jordan_U says probably
use windows cd and repair mbr
